turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, is the Starbucks in Atlanta, GA on 2nd street open right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I have the Starbucks in Atlanta, GA on 2nd street open at this time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, good. I want to order a Cherry Mocha for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. When would you like to pick up a Cherry Moca from Starbucks in Atlanta, GA on 2nd street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How late are they open today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Starbucks in Atlanta, GA on 2nd Street is open until 8 p.m. Monday thru Sunday.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Ok. I want to pick it up at 6 p.m. today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Starbucks offers 4 different sizes of Cherry Moca. Which would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the sizes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Short, Tall, Grande, and Venti

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, I want to order a Grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks offers Almond, Coconut, 2%, Non-Fat, Whole and Soy mik. What would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Um, I think whole milk would be best in the Cherry Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Would you like Whipped Cream on your Cherry Mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, of course.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I have an order for a Grande Cherry Mocha with Whole Milk and Whipped Cream. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You wish to pick your order up at 6:00 p.m. today, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, fantastic. Should I charge the card you have on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Alright, your order of a Grande Cherry Mocha with Whole Milk and Whipped Cream has been ordered and will be ready at 6:00 p.m. at the Startbucks in Atlanta, Ga on 2nd street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have sent your receipt to your cell as text message. The total for your order is 5.95. Is there anything else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
